headline: Applied Materials Clears US Probe As Samsung EPIC Partnership Refocuses Growth
summary: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) has resolved a major US government investigation into past exports to China, paying a settlement and receiving confirmation that the Department of Justice and SEC will not pursue further action. The settlement closes a lengthy regulatory chapter and clarifies the company’s position on US export control compliance. Separately, Applied Materials announced that Samsung will join its new EPIC Center in Silicon Valley, described as the world’s largest...
